item.title: Broken, mud-filled crossover to two driveways, 25th February
item.description:
The crossover from the road to the driveways of nos.34 and 36 Albert Drive has deteriorated so that it is a large muddy puddle. (The photos were taken on a dry day.) They are also now well below the level of the road, so need some stones and then tarmac. The owners of both houses would be grateful if you would repair this, please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 to five huge dangerous craters in the road, 25th February
item.description:
On the uphill stretch of road 50m before the duel carriageway 4/5 massive craters in the road that are unavailable and causing damage to cars. This morning and exhaust was ripped off a car in front of me. These are dangerous craters that will cause an accident.

item.title: Manhole cover in road opposite 74 Evesham Rd persistently ‘lifts’ during heavy rainfall allowing stormwater to flood the road and thereby enter the brook which is owned by the residents of the Wendlescliffe estate. This turns the brook into an erosive torrent which is doing huge and expensive damage to tge brook banks. The loose/leaking manhole cover is therefore causing damage beyond its immediate location, and causing excessive flooding to the road and adjacent driveways.There is video evidence of the faulty manhole cover whenever it rains heavily. Plus video evidence of the brook in full flow., 25th February
item.description:
The faulty manhole cover/drain is located opposite 74 Evesham Road, Bishop’s Cleeve. Because it leads to excessive flooding, the whole of the road surface is damaged and dangerous for cyclists, plus all the floodwater drains into the Dean Brook (on the Wendlescliffe Estate). The brook cannot cope. with such excessive ingress of floodwater, which is causing expensive and long term damage to the brook banks. Urgent action is required to reduce the floodwater rising from the manhole cover.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Evesham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
